name: Kendan and the Gem of Eru (StompyPawsStudios)
name_original: Kendan and the Gem of Eru (StompyPawsStudios)
description:
The demo takes place in the Elven city of Hamùn's tavern and will be available after unlocking an optional side quest.

Visit Stompy Paws Studios to pre-order the full game.

Kendan and the Gem of Erú is a fantasy RPG made in GB Studio.  

CONTROLS:

D-PAD - Arrow KEYS

(A) - X KEY

(B) - Z KEY

START - ENTER/RETURN

SELECT - SHIFT

*Gameplay limitations have been put in place for this demo. 

Ruby Fields - Bottle'o licensed via The Brag Media 2022
